title: Porting SkTextBox to support draw text in wrap
body:
_From @tangkhaiphuong on June 9, 2017 7:48_

Skia native version have SkTextBox support draw text in wrap, please implement to support this feature.

https://github.com/google/skia/blob/fcee51038aeaf3596a4ffcdba0bf18e3155e09b9/include/utils/SkTextBox.h

_Copied from original issue: mono/SkiaSharp#313_
